projects.title: Full Stack Works
projects.description: My main Interest and Strength, i have been doing Full Stack Web Building since quite long and in terms of professional Experience also, i have done this in both my internships at US based startups: Evva Health(MERN tech Stack) and Pollvault(FARM Tech Stack). And I am currently continuing this path in my current company Deloitte where i am using MERN Tech Stack

projects.title: Data and Devops Works
projects.description: Data Science has always been a pretty interesting front for me as I have created Many projects in my college days and till now too. In my starting days in Deloitte, i was assigned some data science projects before getting the software engineer role.

projects.title: AI and ML/DL Works
projects.description: During the my First Internship experience, the main component of the work was creating an AI Assistant(Chatbot). Since then, i have been very indulged in AI works and projects and research a lot on these. Also i published a research paper on Brain tumor using ML/DL which was published well on Springer US

experience.title: Full Stack, Devops And AI Engineer
